name: Monoriel
tagline: A super simplistic but useful ruby web framework
body:
### Welcome to Monoriel GitHub Page
This page was generated automatically by github pages...
But i added this content for more examples of using Monoriel

### What is Monoriel?
Monoriel is an attempt to create a super simple Web Development Mini Framework, and believe me,
monoriel is quiet small. But it can create web apps using a simplistic approach by means of http verbs
or something RESTful as it is known.

### Why do i must use Monoriel?
Because is simple and can process Slim, Haml and Scss templates to generate Web Pages an Web Apps.
You can use any rack middleware with monoriel. You can create before an after filters an helper
methods for your app. Every method just need to be prefixed with the http method it responds, like

    def index
      render 'index'
    end
    
    def post_client
      client = Client.new
      client.name = params["name"]
      client.create
    end
    
    def put_client(id)
      client = clients.read id
      client.name = params["name"]
      client.update
    end
    
    def delete_client(id)
      clients.destroy id
    end

as you see, you don't need to prefix GET methods and index is the default method
when the / route is browsed.

### Using layouts for templates
As you can note in the code above, there is a method called render. 
This method is not part of Monoriel, in fact is a Helper method but you can write it:

    helpers do
      def render template
        slim :layout do
           slim template.to_sym
        end
      end
      def redirect dir
        @res.redirect dir
      end
      def params
        @r.params
      end
    end

and that's all, now you have **layout supporting** for Slim templates engine, but you can
do the same for haml, or erb, just code render method as shown above.I have included the
**redirect** and **params** methods which are something common for use in an app.

### Authors and Contributors
Monoriel was forked from mini-train which was forked from rack/golem by me
you can download as a gem from rubygems using:

    sudo gem install monoriel
